name: Healthy Popsicles with Kiwi & Pineapple
description: Healthy popsicles are the best refreshment on hot summer days! And in contrast to store-bought popsicles, these homemade popsicles are completely sugar-free and contain lots of vitamins and nutrients. And the best thing is you need only 10 minutes to make them!

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients into a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the kiwi into very thin slices and put them on the inside of the popsicles molds. They will only stick if the slices are really thin.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the kiwi into very thin slices and put them on the inside of the popsicles molds. They will only stick if the slices are really thin.

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully fill the smoothie into the popsicle molds, add a popsicle stick, and freeze them for about 12 hours. To get the homemade popsicles out of the mold, just put the popsicles molds under hot running water for a few seconds. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Carefully fill the smoothie into the popsicle molds, add a popsicle stick, and freeze them for about 12 hours. To get the homemade popsicles out of the mold, just put the popsicles molds under hot running water for a few seconds. Enjoy!
